game_description: Hang out with your friends and party in this sci-fi music experience! Visit the unique clubs defining Starcade Arcade and enjoy the casual multiplayer party games in each room. • Test your aim in a sci-fi western saloon with a game of Space Pong. • Enjoy classics like Tic-Tac Toe by playing with life-size VR objects. • Vibe with all species of aliens in the notorious Club Jazz. • Party with DJ Inkers while you play with Space Slurpies. • Discover the dark secret buried beneath an art deco dining hall. • Finally, relax and enjoy the show as you attend the StarRaver Concert. You are our invited guest to the Starcade Arcade universe, and we would like to introduce you as an exclusive VIP in our multiversal club: StarRaver.
